   22: -module(ssl_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Common test
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_suite/1,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2
   39:         ]).
   40: 
   41: %% Test cases
   42: -export([no_auth/0,
   43:          no_auth/1,
   44:          auth/0,
   45:          auth/1,
   46:          client_auth_custom_key/0,
   47:          client_auth_custom_key/1,
   48:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   49:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   50:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   51:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   52:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/0,
   53:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/1,
   54:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   55:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   56:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   57:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   58:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   59:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   60:          client_auth_sni/0,
   61:          client_auth_sni/1,
   62:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/0,
   63:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/1,
   64:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   65:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   66:          missing_root_cert_auth/0,
   67:          missing_root_cert_auth/1,
   68:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/0,
   69:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/1,
   70:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/0,
   71:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/1,
   72:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/0,
   73:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/1,
   74:          verify_fun_always_run_client/0,
   75:          verify_fun_always_run_client/1,
   76:          verify_fun_always_run_server/0,
   77:          verify_fun_always_run_server/1,
   78:          incomplete_chain_auth/0,
   79:          incomplete_chain_auth/1,
   80:          no_chain_client_auth/0,
   81:          no_chain_client_auth/1,
   82:          invalid_signature_client/0,
   83:          invalid_signature_client/1,
   84:          invalid_signature_server/0,
   85:          invalid_signature_server/1,
   86:          critical_extension_auth/0,
   87:          critical_extension_auth/1,
   88:          critical_extension_client_auth/0,
   89:          critical_extension_client_auth/1,
   90:          critical_extension_no_auth/0,
   91:          critical_extension_no_auth/1,
   92:          extended_key_usage_auth/0,
   93:          extended_key_usage_auth/1,
   94:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/0,
   95:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/1,
   96:          cert_expired/0,
   97:          cert_expired/1,
   98:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/0,
   99:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/1,
  100:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/0,
  101:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/1,
  102:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
  103:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,
  104:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/0,
  105:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
  106:          longer_chain/0,
  107:          longer_chain/1,
  108:          cross_signed_chain/0,
  109:          cross_signed_chain/1,
  110:          expired_root_with_cross_signed_root/0,
  111:          expired_root_with_cross_signed_root/1,
  112:          key_auth_ext_sign_only/0,
  113:          key_auth_ext_sign_only/1,
  114:          hello_retry_request/0,
  115:          hello_retry_request/1,
  116:          custom_groups/0,
  117:          custom_groups/1,
  118:          hello_retry_client_auth/0,
  119:          hello_retry_client_auth/1,
  120:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
  121:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
  122:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
  123:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
  124:          basic_rsa_1024/0,
  125:          basic_rsa_1024/1,
  126:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/0,
  127:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/1,
  128:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/0,
  129:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/1,
  130:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/0,
  131:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/1,
  132:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/0,
  133:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/1
  134:          ]).
  135: 
  136: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  137: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: 
  140: all() ->
  141:     [
  142:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  143:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  144:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  145:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  146:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  147:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  148:     ].
  149: 
  150: groups() ->
  151:     [
  152:      {'tlsv1.3', [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()}, 
  153:      {'tlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  154:      {'tlsv1.1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  155:      {'tlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  156:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  157:      {'dtlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  158:      {rsa, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer]},
  159:      {ecdsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  160:      {dsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  161:      {rsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++
  162:           tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer, basic_rsa_1024]},
  163:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_2_rsa_tests()},
  164:      {rsa_pss_rsae_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  165:      {rsa_pss_pss, [], all_version_tests()},
  166:      {rsa_pss_pss_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  167:      {ecdsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++
  168:           [signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1,
  169:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1,
  170:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1]},
  171:      {eddsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  172:     ].
  173: 
  174: ssl_protocol_groups() ->
  175:     [{group, rsa},
  176:      {group, dsa}].
  177: 
  178: tls_1_2_protocol_groups() ->
  179:     [{group, rsa},
  180:      {group, ecdsa},
  181:      {group, dsa},
  182:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae},
  183:      {group, rsa_pss_pss}
  184:     ].
  185: 
  186: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  187:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  188:      {group, ecdsa_1_3},
  189:      {group, eddsa_1_3},
  190:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae_1_3},
  191:      {group, rsa_pss_pss_1_3}
  192:     ].
  193: 
  194: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  195:     [
  196:      hello_retry_request,
  197:      custom_groups,
  198:      client_auth_no_suitable_chain,
  199:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  200:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  201:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  202:      server_certificate_authorities_disabled
  203:     ].
  204: 
  205: pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  206:     [
  207:      key_auth_ext_sign_only
  208:     ].
  209: 
  210: rsa_tests() ->
  211:    [
  212:     longer_chain,
  213:     cross_signed_chain,
  214:     expired_root_with_cross_signed_root
  215:    ].
  216: 
  217: tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  218:      [
  219:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  220:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  221:      ].
  222: 
  223: tls_1_2_rsa_tests() ->
  224:      [
  225:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  226:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  227:      ].
  228: 
  229: all_version_tests() ->
  230:     [
  231:      no_auth,
  232:      auth,
  233:      client_auth_custom_key,
  234:      client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  235:      client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  236:      client_auth_use_partial_chain,
  237:      client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain,
  238:      client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail,
  239:      client_auth_sni,
  240:      missing_root_cert_no_auth,
  241:      missing_root_cert_auth,
  242:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept,
  243:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject,
  244:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept,
  245:      verify_fun_always_run_client,
  246:      verify_fun_always_run_server,
  247:      incomplete_chain_auth,
  248:      no_chain_client_auth,
  249:      invalid_signature_client,
  250:      invalid_signature_server,
  251:      critical_extension_auth,
  252:      critical_extension_client_auth,
  253:      critical_extension_no_auth,
  254:      extended_key_usage_auth,
  255:      extended_key_usage_client_auth,
  256:      cert_expired,
  257:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext,
  258:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment
  259:     ].
  260: 
  261: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  262:     catch crypto:stop(),
  263:     try crypto:start() of
  264: 	ok ->
  265:             Config
  266:     catch _:_ ->
  267: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  268:     end.
  269: 
  270: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  271:     ssl:stop(),
  272:     application:unload(ssl),
  273:     application:stop(crypto).
  274: 
  275: 
  276: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  277:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  278:         true  ->
  279:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  280:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  281:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  282:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  283:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  284:         false ->
  285:             do_init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
  286:     end.
  287: 
  288: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == rsa;
  289:                                        Group == rsa_1_3 ->
  290:     Config1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  291:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config1),
  292:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  293:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  294:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  295:     [{cert_key_alg, rsa},
  296:      {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)},
  297:      {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)} |
  298:      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  299:                   [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  300:                    {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  301:                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  302:                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  303: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  304:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss ->
  305:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  306:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  307:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  308: 
  309:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  310:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  311:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  312:         true ->
  313:             #{client_config := COpts,
  314:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  315:             [{cert_key_alg, Alg},
  316:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)},
  317:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)} |
  318:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  319:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  320:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  321:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  322:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  323:         false ->
  324:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  325:     end;
  326: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae_1_3;
  327:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss_1_3 ->
  328: 
  329:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  330:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  331:     
  332:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts) 
  333:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts) 
  334:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  335:         true ->
  336:             #{client_config := COpts,
  337:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  338:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa_alg(Alg)} |
  339:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  340:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  341:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  342:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  343:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  344:         false ->
  345:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  346:     end;
  347: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == ecdsa;
  348:                                        Group == ecdsa_1_3 ->
  349: 
  350:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  351:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  352:         true ->
  353:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  354:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  355:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  356:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  357:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  358:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  359:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  360:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  361:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  362:                          )];
  363:         false ->
  364:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  365:     end;
  366: do_init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  367:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  368:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  369:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg)) of
  370:         true ->
  371:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  372:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  373:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  374:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  375:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  376:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}),
  377:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  378:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir, "client_eddsa"),
  379:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  380: 
  381:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  382:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  383:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  384:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  385:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  386:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  387:                          )];
  388:         false ->
  389:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  390:     end;
  391: do_init_per_group(dsa = Alg, Config0) ->
  392:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  393:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  394:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg) of
  395:         true ->
  396:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  397:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  398:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  399:             [{cert_key_alg, dsa},
  400:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  401:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}]},
  402:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  403:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}]} |
  404:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  405:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  406:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  407:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  408:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  409:         false ->
  410:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  411:     end;
  412: do_init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  413:     Config.
  414: 
  415: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  416:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  417: 
  418: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1, Config) ->
  419:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp256r1);
  420: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1, Config) ->
  421:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp384r1);
  422: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1, Config) ->
  423:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp521r1);
  424: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  425:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  426:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  427:     Config.
  428: 
  429: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  430:     Config.
  431: 
  432: init_ecdsa_opts(Config0, Curve) ->
  433:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  434:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  435:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  436:         true ->
  437:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_ecdsa_cert(Config0, Curve),
  438:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  439:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  440:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  441:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  442:                           [{client_cert_opts, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ COpts},
  443:                            {server_cert_opts, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ SOpts} |
  444:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  445:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  446:                          )];
  447:         false ->
  448:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  449:     end.
  450: 
  451: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  452: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  453: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  454: no_auth() ->
  455:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  456: 
  457: no_auth(Config) ->
  458:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  459: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  460: auth() ->
  461:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  462: auth(Config) ->
  463:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  464: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  465: client_auth_custom_key() ->
  466:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_custom_key().
  467: client_auth_custom_key(Config) ->
  468:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_custom_key(Config).
  469: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  470: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  471:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  472: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  473:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  474: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  475: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  476:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  477: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  478:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  480: client_auth_no_suitable_chain() ->
  481:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_no_suitable_chain().
  482: client_auth_no_suitable_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  483:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_no_suitable_chain(Config).
  484: 
  485: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  486: client_auth_use_partial_chain() ->
  487:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain().
  488: client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  489:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config).
  490: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  492:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain().
  493: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  494:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config).

  519: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  520: missing_root_cert_auth() ->
  521:     [{doc,"Must have ROOT certs to be able to verify verify peer"}].
  522: missing_root_cert_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  523:     ServerOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)),
  524:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  525:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  526:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  527: 					      {from, self()},
  528: 					      {options, no_reuse(Version) ++ [{verify, verify_peer}
  529:                                                                              | ServerOpts]}]),
  530: 
  531:     Error = {error, {options, incompatible,
  532:                      [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]}},
  533:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Error),
  534:     
  535:     ClientOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)),
  536:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  537: 					      {from, self()},
  538: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer}
  539: 							 | ClientOpts]}]),
  540: 
  541:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, Error).
  542:     
  543: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  544: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept() ->
  545:     [{doc, "Test that the client succeeds if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  546:      " with a verify_fun that accepts the unknown CA error"}].
  547: 
  548: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  549:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  550:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  551:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
  552: 			    {valid, UserState};
  553: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  554: 			    {fail, Reason};
  555: 		       (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  556: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  557: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  558: 			    {valid, UserState};
  559: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  560: 			    {valid, UserState}
  561: 		    end, []},
  562:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  563:                                           [{verify, verify_peer}, {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  564:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  565:                                           Config),
  566:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  567: 
  568: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  569: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept() ->
  570:     [{doc, "Test old style verify fun"}].
  571: 
  572: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  573:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  574:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  575:     AcceptBadCa = fun({bad_cert,unknown_ca}, Acc) ->  Acc;
  576:                      (Other, Acc) -> [Other | Acc]
  577: 		  end,
  578:     VerifyFun =
  579: 	fun(ErrorList) ->
  580: 		case lists:foldl(AcceptBadCa, [], ErrorList) of
  581: 		    [] ->    true;
  582: 		    [_|_] -> false
  583: 		end
  584: 	end,
  585:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  586:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  587:                                            {verify_fun, VerifyFun},
  588:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}], Config),
  589:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  590: 
  591: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  592: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject() ->
  593:     [{doc, "Test that the client fails if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  594:      " with a verify_fun that rejects the unknown CA error"}].
  595: 
  596: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject(Config) ->
  597:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  598:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  599:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca} = Reason, _UserState) ->
  600: 			    {fail, Reason};
  601: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  602: 			    {fail, Reason};
  603: 		       (_,{extension, UserState}, _) ->
  604: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  605: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  606: 			    {valid, UserState};
  607: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  608: 			    {valid, UserState}
  609: 		    end, []},
  610:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  611:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  612:                                            {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  613:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  614:                                           Config),
  615:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unknown_ca).
  616: 
  617: 
  618: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  619: incomplete_chain_auth() ->
  620:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify an incompleat chain when we have the certs to rebuild it"}].
  621: incomplete_chain_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  622:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  623:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  624:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  625:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  626:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  627:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  628:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),   
  629:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  630:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  631:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  632:                                                          {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
  633:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  634:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  635:                                                          {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
  636:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  637:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  638: 
  639: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  640: no_chain_client_auth() ->
  641:     [{doc,"In TLS-1.3 test that we allow sending only peer cert if chain CAs are missing and hence"
  642:       " we can not determine if client is in servers auth domain or not, so send and hope"
  643:       " that the cert chain is in the auth domain and that the server possess "
  644:       " intermediates to recreate the chain."}].
  645: no_chain_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  646:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  647:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  648:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  649:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  650:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  651:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  652:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  653:     ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  654:     [ClientRoot| _] = ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  655:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  656:                                                          {cacerts, [ClientRoot]} |
  657:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  658:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  659:                                                          {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  660:                                                          {cacerts,  ClientCas ++ ServerCas} |
  661:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  662:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  663: 
  664: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  665: verify_fun_always_run_client() ->
  666:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  667:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  668: 
  669: verify_fun_always_run_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  670:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  671:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  672:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  673:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  674:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  675: 					      {from, self()},
  676: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  677: 						     no_result, []}},
  678: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  679:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  680: 
  681:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  682:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  683:     %% to call users verify fun
  684:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  685:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  686: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  687: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  688:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  689: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  690: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  691:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  692: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  693: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  694:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  695: 			    {valid, UserState}
  696: 		    end, [0]},
  697: 
  698:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  699: 					      {host, Hostname},
  700: 					      {from, self()},
  701: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  702: 						     no_result, []}},
  703: 					      {options,
  704: 					       [{verify, verify_peer},
  705: 						{verify_fun, FunAndState}
  706: 						| ClientOpts]}]),
  707: 
  708:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  709: 
  710: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  711: verify_fun_always_run_server() ->
  712:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  713:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  714: verify_fun_always_run_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  715:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  716:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  717:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  718: 
  719:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  720:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  721:     %% to call users verify fun
  722:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  723:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  724: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  725: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  726:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  727: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  728: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  729:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  730: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  731: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  732:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  733: 			    {valid, UserState}
  734: 		    end, [0]},
  735: 
  736:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  737:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  738: 					      {from, self()},
  739: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  740: 						     no_result, []}},
  741: 					      {options,
  742:                                                no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer},
  743:                                                                                 {verify_fun, FunAndState} |
  744:                                                                                 ServerOpts]}]),
  745:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  746: 
  747:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  748: 					      {host, Hostname},
  749: 					      {from, self()},
  750: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  751: 						     no_result, []}},
  752: 					      {options, ClientOpts}]),
  753:     
  754:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  755:

  769: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  770: critical_extension_auth() ->
  771:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  772: 
  773: critical_extension_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  774:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  775:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  776:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  777:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  778:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  779:                                                                          [{server_chain, 
  780:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  781:                                                                           {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  782:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  783:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  784:  
  785:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  786:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  787:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  788:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  789:                 {from, self()},
  790:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  no_result, []}},
  791:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  792:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  793:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  794:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  795:                 {host, Hostname},
  796:                 {from, self()},
  797:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  798:                 {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  799: 
  800:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  801: 
  802: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  803: critical_extension_client_auth() ->
  804:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  805: 
  806: critical_extension_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  807:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  808:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  809:      #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  810:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  811:                                                                          [{client_chain, 
  812:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  813:                                                                           {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  814:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  815:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  816:     
  817:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  818:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  819:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  820:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  821:                 {from, self()},
  822:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  823:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  824:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  825:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  826:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  827:                 {host, Hostname},
  828:                 {from, self()},
  829:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  830:                 {options, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]}]),
  831: 
  832:     %% This certificate has a critical extension that we don't
  833:     %% understand.  Therefore, verification should fail.          
  834:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  835:

  842:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  843:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  844:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  845:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  846:                                                                             [{server_chain, 
  847:                                                                               [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  848:                                                                              {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  849:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_none} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  850:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_none} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  851:

  855: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  856: extended_key_usage_auth() ->
  857:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in server cert"}].
  858: 
  859: extended_key_usage_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  860:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  861:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  862:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  863:                                  [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  864:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  865:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  866:                                                                         [{server_chain, 
  867:                                                                           [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  868:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  869:                                                                         ]),
  870:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  871:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  872: 
  873:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  874:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  875:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  876: 					{from, self()},
  877:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  878: 			   {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  879:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  880:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  881: 					{host, Hostname},
  882: 			   {from, self()},
  883:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  884: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} |
  885: 						   ClientOpts]}]),
  886:     
  887:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  888: 
  889:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  890:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  891: 
  892: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  893: extended_key_usage_client_auth() ->
  894:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in client and server cert"}].
  895: 
  896: extended_key_usage_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  897:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  898:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  899:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  900:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
  901:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  902:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  903:                                                                         [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  904:                                                                          {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  905:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  906:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  907:    
  908:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  909:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  910:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  911: 					{from, self()},
  912:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  913:                                         {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  914:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  915:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  916: 					{host, Hostname},
  917: 			   {from, self()},
  918: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  919: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  920:     
  921:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  922: 
  923:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  924:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  925: 
  926: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  927: cert_expired() ->
  928:     [{doc,"Test server with expired certificate"}].
  929: 
  930: cert_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  931:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  932:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  933:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  934:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  935:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  936:                                                                         [{server_chain,
  937:                                                                           [[],
  938:                                                                            [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  939:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  940:                                                                            []
  941:                                                                      ]},
  942:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  943:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  944:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  945:     
  946:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  947:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  948:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  949: 					      {from, self()},
  950: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  951:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  952:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  953: 					      {host, Hostname},
  954: 					      {from, self()},
  955: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),    
  956:     
  957:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, certificate_expired).
  958: 
  959: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  960: no_auth_key_identifier_ext() ->
  961:     [{doc, "Test cert that does not have authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  962: 
  963: no_auth_key_identifier_ext(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  964:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  965:       #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  966:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  967:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  968:                                           [{client_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  969:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  970:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  971:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  972:  
  973:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  974:     
  975: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  976: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment() ->
  977:     [{doc, "Test cert with keyEncipherment key_usage an no"
  978:       " authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  979: 
  980: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  981:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  982:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature, keyEncipherment]}]),
  983:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  984:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  985:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  986:                                           [{client_chain, 
  987:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  988:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  989:                                           ]),
  990:     ClientOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  991:     ServerOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  992:     
  993:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  994: 
  995: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  996: key_auth_ext_sign_only() ->
  997:     [{doc, "Test that client with a certificate without keyEncipherment usage "
  998:     " extension can connect to a server with restricted cipher suites "}].
  999: key_auth_ext_sign_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1000:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
 1001:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature]}]),
 1002:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
 1003:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
 1004:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1005:                                           [{client_chain, 
 1006:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1007:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
 1008:                                           ]),
 1009:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1010:     ClientOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1011:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {ciphers, 
 1012:                                           ssl_test_lib:rsa_non_signed_suites(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version))} 
 1013:                  | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1014:     
 1015:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1016: 
 1017: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1018: longer_chain() ->
 1019:     [{doc,"Test depth option"}].
 1020: longer_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1021:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
 1022:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1023:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1024:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}],
 1025:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1026:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}]],
 1027:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1028:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1029:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
 1030:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
 1031:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1032:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1033:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1034:     
 1035:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
 1036:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version), Config),
 1037:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
 1038:                                            {depth, 5},
 1039:                                            {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
 1040:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)]++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) , Config),
 1041:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1042: 
 1043: cross_signed_chain() ->
 1044:     [{doc, "Manual test of chain with duplicate entries that is cross signing certs are present."}].
 1045: cross_signed_chain(Config)
 1046:   when is_list(Config) ->
 1047:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1048:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1049:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1050:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1051:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1052: 
 1053:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1054:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1055:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1056:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key3}],
 1057:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1058:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1059: 
 1060:     #{client_config := ClientOptsNew} =
 1061:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1062:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1063:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key4}],
 1064:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key1}]],
 1065:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1066: 
 1067:     ServerCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1068:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1069:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1070: 
 1071:     {[Peer,CI1,CI2,CROld], CROld} = chain_and_root(ClientOpts0),
 1072:     {[_Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CRNew], CRNew} = chain_and_root(ClientOptsNew),
 1073: 
 1074:     ServerCas = [CRNew|ServerCas0 -- [CROld]],
 1075:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1076:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1, ServerOpts0, {cacerts, ServerCas})]
 1077:                                           ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1078:                                           Config),
 1079:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1080:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1081:                                                                           lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1082:                                                                              {cert, [Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CI1,CI2,CRNew,CROld]}),
 1083:                                                                           {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1084:                                           Config),
 1085:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
 1086:     ClientOpts2 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1087:                                                           lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1088:                                                                            lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1089:                                                                                             {cert, [Peer,CI1,CI1New,CI2,CI2New,CROld,CRNew]}),
 1090:                                                                            {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1091:                                            Config),
 1092:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts2, ServerOpts, Config),
 1093:     ok.
 1094: 
 1095: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root() ->
 1096:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify a chain with an expired Root Cert if there is an alternative chain with"
 1097:       " a cross signed Root CA further down the chain that is however not present in the sent chain"}].
 1098: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1099: 
 1100:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1101:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1102:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1103:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1104:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1105:     Key6 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6),
 1106:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1107: 
 1108:     %% Create expired ROOT
 1109:     #{cert := Root} = SRoot = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", [{key, Key1},
 1110:                                                                     {validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
 1111:                                                                                 {Year-1, Month, Day}}}]),
 1112:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1113:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRoot,
 1114:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1115:                                                       peer => [{key, Key4}]},
 1116:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key5}],
 1117:                                                       peer => [{key, Key6}]}}),
 1118:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1119:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
 1120:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ServerOpts0,
 1121: 
 1122:     SCert = proplists:get_value(cert, ServerOpts),
 1123:     SCerts = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts),
 1124: 
 1125:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, SCerts}),
 1126:     {ok, Root, [_Peer, CA1, CA2, Root]} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(SCert, ets:new(foo, []), 
 1127:                                                                             ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1128: 
 1129:     OTPCA1 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA1, otp),
 1130:     OTPCA2 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA2, otp),
 1131: 
 1132:     TBS1 = OTPCA1#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1133:     TBS2 = OTPCA2#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1134: 
 1135:     Issuer = TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
 1136: 
 1137:     SubjectPublicKeyInfo = TBS2#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subjectPublicKeyInfo,
 1138: 
 1139:     AltCrossRoot = public_key:pkix_sign(TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = Issuer,
 1140:                                                                  subjectPublicKeyInfo = SubjectPublicKeyInfo}, Key2),
 1141: 
 1142:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts),
 1143: 
 1144:     %% Only expired ROOT present
 1145:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts], ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired),
 1146:     %% Only CROSS ROOT present
 1147:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1148:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)], ServerOpts, Config),
 1149:     %% Both expired ROOT and CROSS ROOT present
 1150:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1151:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot | ClientCas0]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)],
 1152:                             ServerOpts, Config).
 1153: 
 1154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1155: %% TLS 1.3 Test cases  -----------------------------------------------
 1156: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1157: hello_retry_request() ->
 1158:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can request a new group when the client's first key share"
 1159:       "is not supported"}].
 1160: 
 1161: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
 1162:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1163:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1164:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1165:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1166:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1167:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]} | ClientOpts0],
 1168:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1169: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1170: custom_groups() ->
 1171:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can select a common group for key-exchange"}].
 1172: 
 1173: custom_groups(Config) ->
 1174:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1175:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1176: 
 1177:     %% Set versions
 1178:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1179:                   {supported_groups, [x448, secp256r1, secp384r1]}|ServerOpts0],
 1180:     ClientOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1181:     ClientOpts = [{supported_groups,[secp384r1, secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts1],
 1182:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1183: 
 1184: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1185: %% Triggers a Server Alert as ssl client does not have a certificate with a
 1186: %% signature algorithm supported by the server (signature_algorithms_cert extension
 1187: %% of CertificateRequest does not contain the algorithm of the client certificate).
 1188: %% ssl client sends an empty certificate.
 1189: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
 1190:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2) : Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm_cert"}].
 1191: 
 1192: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
 1193:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1194:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1195:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1196:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1197:                   %% Skip rsa_pkcs1_sha256!
 1198:                   {signature_algs_cert, [rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pkcs1_sha512]},
 1199:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1200:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1201:     case Version of
 1202:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 1203:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required);
 1204:         _  ->
 1205:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, bad_certificate)
 1206:     end.
 1207: 
 1208: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1209: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
 1210:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2): Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm"}].
 1211: 
 1212: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
 1213:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1214:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1215:     ClientOpts = [{signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]} | ClientOpts0],
 1216:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1217:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_sha1, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1218:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1219:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1220: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1221: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
 1222:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication."}].
 1223: 
 1224: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
 1225:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1226:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1227:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1228:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1229:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1230:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
 1231:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1232:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1233: 
 1234:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1235: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1236: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
 1237:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client sends an empty " 
 1238:        "certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1239: 
 1240: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
 1241:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1242:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1243:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1244:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1245: 
 1246:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1247:     %% Set versions
 1248:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1249:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1250:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, false},
 1251:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1252:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1253:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1254:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1255: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1256: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
 1257:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client "
 1258:        "sends an empty certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1259: 
 1260: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
 1261:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1262:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1263:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1264:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1265: 
 1266:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1267:     %% Set versions
 1268:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1269:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1270:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1271:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1272:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1273:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1274:    
 1275:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required).
 1276: 
 1277: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1278: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1() ->
 1279:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1280:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1281: 
 1282: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1(Config) ->
 1283:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1284:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1285:     %% Set versions
 1286:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1287:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1288:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1289:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1290:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1291: 
 1292:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1293: 
 1294: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1295: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1() ->
 1296:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1297:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1298: 
 1299: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1(Config) ->
 1300:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1301:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1302:     %% Set versions
 1303:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1304:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1305:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1306:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1307:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1308: 
 1309:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1310: 
 1311: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1312: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1() ->
 1313:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1314:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1315: 
 1316: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1(Config) ->
 1317:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1318:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1319:     %% Set versions
 1320:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1321:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp512r1_sha256,
 1322:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}
 1323:                  | ServerOpts0],
 1324:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1325:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1326:                                     ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1327:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1328:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1329: 
 1330: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1331: basic_rsa_1024() ->
 1332:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (Basic): Test if connection can be established using 1024 bits RSA keys in certificates."}].
 1333: 
 1334: basic_rsa_1024(Config) ->
 1335:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1336:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1337:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1338:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1339:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1340:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1341:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1342: 
 1343: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1344: server_certificate_authorities_disabled() ->
 1345:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Disabling certificate_authorities extension on the server when verify_peer is set to true"
 1346:        " allows the client to send a chain that could be verifiable by the server but that would not adhere to"
 1347:        " the certificate_authorities extension as it is not part of the regular trusted certificate set"}].
 1348: 
 1349: server_certificate_authorities_disabled(Config) ->
 1350:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1351:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1352: 
 1353:     % Strip out the ClientRoot to simulate cases where the they are manually managed and
 1354:     % not expected to be included in certificate requests during mutual authentication.
 1355:     {ok, CACerts0} = ssl_pkix_db:decode_pem_file(proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)),
 1356:     [_ClientRoot | ServerCACerts] = [CertDER || {_, CertDER, _} <- CACerts0],
 1357: 
 1358:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1359:                             {unknown, UserState};
 1360:                        (_, valid, UserState) ->
 1361:                             {valid, UserState};
 1362:                        % Because this is a manually managed setup, we also need to manually verify
 1363:                        % an unknown_ca (ClientCert) as expected. Typically you would have custom logic
 1364:                        % here to decide if you know the cert (like looking up pinned values in a DB)
 1365:                        % but for testing purposes, we'll allow everything
 1366:                        (_, {bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
 1367:                             {valid, UserState};
 1368:                        (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
 1369:                             {valid, UserState}
 1370:                     end, [0]},
 1371: 
 1372:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts0],
 1373:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer},
 1374:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {cacerts, ServerCACerts},
 1375:                   {verify_fun, FunAndState} | ServerOpts0],
 1376:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required),
 1377:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, [{certificate_authorities, false} | ServerOpts], Config).
 1378: 
 1379: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1380: %% Internal functions  -----------------------------------------------
 1381: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1382: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
 1383:     rsa_pss_rsae;
 1384: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
 1385:     rsa_pss_pss;
 1386: rsa_alg(Atom) ->
 1387:     Atom.
 1388: 
 1389: no_reuse(?TLS_1_3) ->
 1390:     [];
 1391: no_reuse(_) ->
 1392:     [{reuse_sessions, false}].
 1393: 
 1394: chain_and_root(Config) ->
 1395:     OwnCert = proplists:get_value(cert, Config),
 1396:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, proplists:get_value(cacerts, Config)}),
 1397:     {ok, Root, Chain} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(OwnCert, ets:new(foo, []), ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1398:     {Chain, Root}.
 1399:
